about_the_game:
Diving into a Forgotten Past

In the game "RAYS," you take on the role of Adam, a character who wakes up in a hospital with no memory of his past. Completely alone, he is forced to embark on a challenging journey filled with numerous trials and unexpected events. Every step he takes is accompanied by intense and emotional moments that stay with the player long after.

Your Choices, Your Fate

The game offers over five different endings, each dependent on your choices and interactions with the world. Throughout the game, you will uncover the personalities of more than 15 characters, each of whom can influence how your story concludes. Thanks to innovative mechanics such as the map and hints, you will gain a better understanding of how to achieve the best outcomes and uncover all the game's secrets.

Visual and Auditory Excellence

Visually, "RAYS" impresses with its variety: over 100 unique backgrounds and carefully crafted ambient music accompany you throughout the game, creating an immersive atmosphere. Environmental sounds — such as footsteps, the creak of a door, or the clink of a sword — bring the game world to life, immersing the player in every character's action, enhancing the sense of presence and realism.

Total Immersion in the World

A complete immersion into a world where every decision matters. Diverse story branches and well-developed characters create a unique experience that makes you ponder every detail.

content_descriptors.notes: This game is a visual novel in the horror genre with elements of psychological tension. The story touches on dark themes such as violence, extreme violence, suicide, self-harm, trauma, and the consequences of actions taken by the characters. There are scenes depicting psychological suffering and morally challenging decisions that can significantly impact the development of the plot. These elements are an integral part of the story and are intended for a mature audience.
